Auth.description: Sign In to stake and unlock your full Guru experience: AI agents, activities & rewards

Metadata.defaultTitle: {appName} App – AI-Powered Blockchain Automations and Rewards
Metadata.defaultDescription: Join the {appName} on Telegram: Experience AI-powered blockchain automations, create decentralized applications, and earn rewards by participating in the network!
Metadata.siteDescription: Discover the future of DeFi with AI agents, staking rewards, and advanced trading tools on {appName}.
Metadata.keywords: DeFi, AI agents, blockchain, staking, trading, cryptocurrency, Web3, rewards, automation

aifeed.title: AI Feed - {appName}
aifeed.description: Stay updated with AI-powered insights and community activities. Join the AI revolution in DeFi.

tasks.title: Actions & Tasks - {appName}
tasks.description: Complete tasks, earn rewards, and participate in the {appName} ecosystem. Start your DeFi journey today.

staking.title: Stake & Earn - {appName}
staking.description: Stake your tokens and earn rewards. Choose from multiple staking options with competitive APY rates.

tokens.title: Token Explorer - {appName}
tokens.description: Discover trending tokens, analyze market data, and find the best trading opportunities in DeFi.

swap.title: Token Swap - {appName}
swap.description: Swap tokens seamlessly across multiple chains with the best rates and lowest fees.

AIFeed.title: {appName} Application and Community
AIFeed.description: {appName} — community and personal space for subscribers: news, statistics, support and services in one place.

support.title: Support
support.description1: All support requests from subscribers will be sent to this Telegram group.
support.description2: Our support team is also in this group and will help with complex cases.

aiAssistant.taskCancelled: AI Assistant: Task "{taskName}" has been cancelled. You're back to the main menu.

aiAssistant.taskError: AI Assistant: Sorry, there was an error completing "{taskName}". Please try again.

toasts.taskCompletedError: Failed to complete task "{taskName}". Please try again.

chest.description: Complete tasks, claim rewards, repeat tomorrow. Act fast before the pool runs out!

support.title: Need Assistance?
support.description: Encountering an issue or have a question? Our support team is here to help you. Reach out and we'll get you back on track.

properties.referralEarning: Earn an additional 1% from the activity of all users you refer.

AgentsIntro.title: Unlock Market Insights with {aiName}
AgentsIntro.supportService: Trade Smarter, Not Harder: {aiName}'s intelligent agents crunch real-time market data, track social sentiment, and execute trades automatically—giving you a hands-free edge. Start your AI-powered trading journey today!
AgentsIntro.personalAssistant: Stay Ahead of the Curve: With real-time on-chain and social sentiment analysis, {aiName} monitors whale moves and market trends to uncover winning opportunities. Don't miss your next big trade—sign up now!
AgentsIntro.generativeAi: Automate Your Success: From portfolio rebalancing to liquidity strategies, {aiName} optimizes every decision using live data and predictive modeling. Let AI take the wheel—get started today!
